sqlMap.select: select t.*,rownum from (select ZC_MAKE_CODE,ZC_MAKE_NAME,ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE,(select val from as_val where valset_id='ZC_VS_FUKUAN_TYPE' and val_id='G03') as zc_fukuan_type from zc_p_pro_make where ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE>sysdate and zc_fukuan_type='G03' order by ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE) t where rownum < 7
select count(*) as COUNT_NUM from zc_p_pro_make

select make.zc_attr5, make.ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE, make.zc_make_name, pp.zc_bra_name, mer.zc_mer_code, mer.zc_mer_name, itemmer.zc_base_ggyq, itemmer.zc_caig_num, itemmer.zc_su_code, itemmer.zc_item_sum from zc_p_pro_make make, zc_p_pro_mitem item, zc_p_pro_mitem_mer itemmer, zc_b_merchandise mer, zc_zb_pinp pp where make.zc_make_code = item.zc_make_code and make.zc_make_code = itemmer.zc_make_code and item.zc_pitem_code=itemmer.zc_pitem_code and itemmer.zc_mer_code = mer.zc_mer_code and item.zc_bra_code = pp.zc_bra_code and make.zc_make_code = #zcMakeCode#

select ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_MAKE_NAME, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_MAKE_TEL, ZC_MAKE_STATUS, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_PRO_REMARK, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_MONEY_ZC_SUM, ZC_MAKE_APPR_SNO, ZC_MAKE_APPR, ZC_MAKE_APPR_BLOBID, ZC_REMARK, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_MAKE_FROM, AGENCY, ZC_IS_AGENCY, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG_BLOBID, ZC_IS_TO_CGZX, ZC_MAKE_FLAG, ORG_CODE, ZC_PITEM_OPIWAY, ZC_PIFU_CGFS, ZC_PITEM_MODE, ZC_CD_AWDAREA, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ORG_NAME, ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX, ZC_MONEY_KY_BGS, ZC_MONEY_BG_ZXS, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ_BLOBID, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ, AGENCY_NAME, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_MONEY_HT_YBA, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_WEITO_DATE, ZC_YEP_FLAG, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_PROJ_ORIGN, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA_ZJ, ZC_IS_NOTARY, ZC_IS_IMP, ZC_IS_REMARK, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, ZC_PRINT_STATUS, ZC_MAKE_SEQUENCE, ZC_IS_BUDGET, ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE,ZC_NO_SHIP_REASON,ZC_ATTR1,ZC_ATTR2,ZC_ATTR3,ZC_ATTR4,ZC_ATTR5,ZC_TEMP_MAKE_CODE,pro_id,'' pro_name ,ZC_MAKE_PF_SEQUENCE,is_des_sup,is_pub,is_car from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE ZC_P_PRO_MAKE, (SELECT h.instance_id,MAX(to_date(h.execute_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AS d FROM wf_action h GROUP BY h.instance_id) wh where ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.process_inst_id=wh.instance_id(+) and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ND = #nd:INTEGER#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.process_inst_id) and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS!='cancel' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS!='exec' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS!='jingjiaing' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS!='jingjiaycj'
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS ='exec'
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'G01' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS = 'exec' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.zc_make_code in (select zc_make_code from zc_p_pro_mitem item where item.zc_is_cheng_jiao is null and item.zc_su_code = #zcText0# )
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'G01' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.zc_make_code in (select zc_make_code from zc_p_pro_mitem item where item.zc_is_cheng_jiao = '2' and item.zc_su_code = #zcText0# )
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'G01' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS = 'confirm'
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.process_inst_id) or ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.process_inst_id = -1 ) and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS !='cancel'
(ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS ='exec') and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE in ('G01')
(ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS ='cancel')
(ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS ='exec' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE>=sysdate)
(ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS ='exec' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE<sysdate)
(ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS ='jingjiaycj' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE<sysdate)
1=1
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.CO_CODE=#coCode:VARCHAR#
(ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'Z01' or ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'G02' or ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'F03')
(ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'G01') ( ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = 'G03')
ORDER BY WH.D DESC

select ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_MAKE_NAME, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_MAKE_TEL, ZC_MAKE_STATUS, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_PRO_REMARK, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_MONEY_ZC_SUM, ZC_MAKE_APPR_SNO, ZC_MAKE_APPR, ZC_MAKE_APPR_BLOBID, ZC_REMARK, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_MAKE_FROM, AGENCY, ZC_IS_AGENCY, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG_BLOBID, ZC_IS_TO_CGZX, ZC_MAKE_FLAG, ORG_CODE, ZC_PITEM_OPIWAY, ZC_PIFU_CGFS, ZC_PITEM_MODE, ZC_CD_AWDAREA, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ORG_NAME, ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX, ZC_MONEY_KY_BGS, ZC_MONEY_BG_ZXS, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ_BLOBID, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ, AGENCY_NAME, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_MONEY_HT_YBA, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_WEITO_DATE, ZC_YEP_FLAG, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_PROJ_ORIGN, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA_ZJ, ZC_IS_NOTARY, ZC_IS_IMP, ZC_IS_REMARK, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, ZC_PRINT_STATUS, ZC_MAKE_SEQUENCE, ZC_IS_BUDGET, ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE,ZC_NO_SHIP_REASON,ZC_ATTR1,ZC_ATTR2,ZC_ATTR3,ZC_ATTR4,ZC_ATTR5,ZC_TEMP_MAKE_CODE,pro_id,'' pro_name ,ZC_MAKE_PF_SEQUENCE,is_des_sup,is_pub,is_car from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE ZC_P_PRO_MAKE where ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ND = #nd:INTEGER#
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.CO_CODE=#coCode:VARCHAR#
( (ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE ='G03' ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN (SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM , (select distinct zc_b_merchandise.zc_bra_code, zc_b_mer_discount.zc_su_code from zc_b_merchandise, zc_b_mer_discount where zc_b_merchandise.zc_mer_code = zc_b_mer_discount.zc_mer_code) bra_su WHERE ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.zc_bra_code = bra_su.zc_bra_code AND bra_su.ZC_SU_CODE =#executor:VARCHAR#)
) or ( ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE ='G01' ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN (SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM WHERE ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE=#executor:VARCHAR#) ) )
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE='G03' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE>=sysdate
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN (SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM , (select distinct zc_b_merchandise.zc_bra_code, zc_b_mer_discount.zc_su_code from zc_b_merchandise, zc_b_mer_discount where zc_b_merchandise.zc_mer_code = zc_b_mer_discount.zc_mer_code) bra_su WHERE ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.zc_bra_code = bra_su.zc_bra_code AND bra_su.ZC_SU_CODE =#executor:VARCHAR#)
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE='G03' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE<sysdate
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN (SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM, (select distinct zc_b_merchandise.zc_bra_code, zc_b_mer_discount.zc_su_code from zc_b_merchandise, zc_b_mer_discount where zc_b_merchandise.zc_mer_code = zc_b_mer_discount.zc_mer_code) bra_su WHERE ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.zc_bra_code = bra_su.zc_bra_code AND bra_su.ZC_SU_CODE =#executor:VARCHAR#)
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE='G03'
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN (SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM WHERE ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE=#executor:VARCHAR#)
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE='G01' and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN (SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM WHERE ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE IS NOT NULL)
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE IN (SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_MAKE_CODE FROM ZC_P_PRO_MITEM WHERE ZC_P_PRO_MITEM.ZC_SU_CODE=#executor:VARCHAR#)
and ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS='exec'
order by ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_INPUT_DATE desc

select ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_MAKE_NAME, CO_CODE,ND, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_MAKE_TEL, ZC_MAKE_STATUS, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_PRO_REMARK, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_MONEY_ZC_SUM, ZC_MAKE_APPR_SNO, ZC_MAKE_APPR, ZC_MAKE_APPR_BLOBID, ZC_REMARK, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_MAKE_FROM, AGENCY, ZC_IS_AGENCY, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG_BLOBID, ZC_IS_TO_CGZX, ZC_MAKE_FLAG, ORG_CODE, ZC_PITEM_OPIWAY, ZC_PIFU_CGFS, ZC_PITEM_MODE, ZC_CD_AWDAREA, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ORG_NAME, ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX, ZC_MONEY_KY_BGS, ZC_MONEY_BG_ZXS, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ_BLOBID, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ, AGENCY_NAME, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_MONEY_HT_YBA, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_WEITO_DATE, ZC_YEP_FLAG, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_PROJ_ORIGN, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA_ZJ, ZC_IS_NOTARY, ZC_IS_IMP, ZC_IS_REMARK, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, ZC_PRINT_STATUS, ZC_MAKE_SEQUENCE, ZC_IS_BUDGET, ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE,ZC_NO_SHIP_REASON,ZC_ATTR1,ZC_ATTR2,ZC_ATTR3,ZC_ATTR4,ZC_ATTR5,ZC_TEMP_MAKE_CODE ,pro_id,(select CHR_NAME from zc_p_pro where CHR_ID = ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.pro_id) pro_name,ZC_MAKE_PF_SEQUENCE, is_des_sup,is_pub,is_car from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_P_PRO_MAKE (ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_MAKE_NAME, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_MAKE_TEL, ZC_MAKE_STATUS, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_PRO_REMARK, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_MAKE_SEQUENCE, ZC_IS_BUDGET,ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE, ZC_NO_SHIP_REASON,ZC_ATTR2,ZC_ATTR3,ZC_TEMP_MAKE_CODE,PRO_ID,ZC_MAKE_PF_SEQUENCE,is_des_sup,is_pub,is_car) values (#zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeName:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #nd:CHAR#, #zcMakeLinkman:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeTel:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeStatus:VARCHAR#, #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, #zcInputDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcProRemark:VARCHAR#, #zcMoneyBiSum:DECIMAL#, #zcMoneyZcSum:DECIMAL#, #zcMakeApprSno:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeAppr:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeApprBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcRemark:VARCHAR#, #processInstId:DECIMAL#, #zcMakeFrom:VARCHAR#, #agency:VARCHAR#, #zcIsAgency:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhaobiao:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhaobiaoBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhaogg:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhaoggBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhongbiao:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhongbiaoBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhonggg:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhongggBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcIsToCgzx:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeFlag:VARCHAR#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, #zcPitemOpiway:VARCHAR#, #zcPifuCgfs:VARCHAR#, #zcPitemMode:VARCHAR#, #zcCdAwdarea:VARCHAR#, #zcIsZxqyZb:VARCHAR#, #zcHangyeCtg:VARCHAR#, #orgName:VARCHAR#, #zcMoneyBiYzx:DECIMAL#, #zcMoneyKyBgs:DECIMAL#, #zcMoneyBgZxs:DECIMAL#, #zcFgkzbfsSmwjBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcFgkzbfsSmwj:VARCHAR#, #agencyName:VARCHAR#, #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, #zcMoneyHtYba:DECIMAL#, #zcFukuanType:VARCHAR#, #zcWeitoDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcYepFlag:VARCHAR#, #zcYepSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#, #zcProjOrign:VARCHAR#, #zcDiyuDaimaZj:VARCHAR#, #zcIsNotary:VARCHAR#, #zcIsImp:VARCHAR#, #zcIsRemark:VARCHAR#, #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcPrintStatus:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeSequence:VARCHAR#, #isDesSup:VARCHAR#,#isPub:VARCHAR#,#isCar:VARCHAR#)

sqlMap.select: select count(*) from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE
sqlMap.update:
update ZC_P_PRO_MAKE
ZC_MAKE_CODE = #record.zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_NAME = #record.zcMakeName:VARCHAR#
CO_CODE = #record.coCode:VARCHAR#
ND = #record.nd:CHAR#
ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN = #record.zcMakeLinkman:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_TEL = #record.zcMakeTel:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_STATUS = #record.zcMakeStatus:VARCHAR#
ZC_INPUT_CODE = #record.zcInputCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_INPUT_DATE = #record.zcInputDate:TIMESTAMP#
ZC_PRO_REMARK = #record.zcProRemark:VARCHAR#
ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM = #record.zcMoneyBiSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_MONEY_ZC_SUM = #record.zcMoneyZcSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_MAKE_APPR_SNO = #record.zcMakeApprSno:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_APPR = #record.zcMakeAppr:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_APPR_BLOBID = #record.zcMakeApprBlobid:VARCHAR#
ZC_REMARK = #record.zcRemark:VARCHAR#
PROCESS_INST_ID = #record.processInstId:DECIMAL#
ZC_MAKE_FROM = #record.zcMakeFrom:VARCHAR#
AGENCY = #record.agency:VARCHAR#
ZC_IS_AGENCY = #record.zcIsAgency:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO = #record.zcMakeZhaobiao:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO_BLOBID = #record.zcMakeZhaobiaoBlobid:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG = #record.zcMakeZhaogg:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG_BLOBID = #record.zcMakeZhaoggBlobid:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO = #record.zcMakeZhongbiao:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO_BLOBID = #record.zcMakeZhongbiaoBlobid:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG = #record.zcMakeZhonggg:VARCHAR#
ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG_BLOBID = #record.zcMakeZhongggBlobid:VARCHAR#
ZC_IS_TO_CGZX = #record.zcIsToCgzx:VARCHAR#

update ZC_P_PRO_MAKE set ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_NAME = #zcMakeName:VARCHAR#, CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#, ND = #nd:CHAR#, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN = #zcMakeLinkman:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_TEL = #zcMoneyBiSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_MONEY_ZC_SUM = #zcMoneyZcSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_MAKE_APPR_SNO = #zcMakeApprSno:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_APPR = #zcMakeAppr:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_APPR_BLOBID = #zcMakeApprBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeZhaobiao:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO_BLOBID = #zcMakeZhaobiaoBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG = #zcMakeZhaogg:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG_BLOBID = #zcMakeZhaoggBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO = = #zcIsToCgzx:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_FLAG = #zcMakeFlag:VARCHAR#, ORG_CODE = #orgCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_OPIWAY = #zcPitemOpiway:VARCHAR#, ZC_PIFU_CGFS = #zcPifuCgfs:VARCHAR#, ZC_PITEM_MODE = #zcPitemMode:VARCHAR#, ZC_CD_AWDAREA = #zcCdAwdarea:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB = #zcIsZxqyZb:VARCHAR#, ZC_HANGYE_CTG = #zcHangyeCtg:VARCHAR#, ORG_NAME = #orgName:VARCHAR#, ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX = #zcMoneyBiYzx:DECIMAL#, ZC_MONEY_KY_BGS = #zcMoneyKyBgs:DECIMAL#, ZC_MONEY_BG_ZXS = #zcMoneyBgZxs:DECIMAL#, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ_BLOBID = #zcFgkzbfsSmwjBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ = #zcFgkzbfsSmwj:VARCHAR#, AGENCY_NAME = #agencyName:VARCHAR#, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA = #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, ZC_MONEY_HT_YBA = #zcMoneyHtYba:DECIMAL#, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = #zcFukuanType:VARCHAR#, ZC_WEITO_DATE = #zcWeitoDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_YEP_FLAG = #zcYepFlag:VARCHAR#, ZC_YEP_SUM = #zcYepSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM = #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_PROJ_ORIGN = #zcProjOrign:VARCHAR#, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA_ZJ = #zcDiyuDaimaZj:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_NOTARY = #zcIsNotary:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_IMP = #zcIsImp:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_REMARK = #zcIsRemark:VARCHAR#, ZC_IMP_FILE = #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID = #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_PRINT_STATUS = #zcPrintStatus:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_SEQUENCE = #zcMakeSequence:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_BUDGET = #zcIsBudget:VARCHAR#, ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE = #zcXieYiEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_NO_SHIP_REASON = #zcNoShipReason:VARCHAR#, is_des_sup=#isDesSup:VARCHAR#, is_pub=#isPub:VARCHAR#, is_car=#isCar:VARCHAR# where ZC_TEMP_MAKE_CODE = #zcTempMakeCode:VARCHAR#
update ZC_P_PRO_MAKE set ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX = (ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX + #bidUseMoneySum:DECIMAL#) where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #makeCode#

update ZC_P_PRO_MAKE set ZC_ATTR1 = #zcAttr1:VARCHAR#, ZC_ATTR2 = #zcAttr2:VARCHAR#, ZC_ATTR3 = #zcAttr3:VARCHAR#, ZC_ATTR4 = #zcAttr4:VARCHAR#, ZC_ATTR5 = #zcAttr5:VARCHAR# where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT OWNER FROM WF_ACTION WHERE ACTION_ID = (SELECT MAX(ACTION_ID) FROM WF_ACTION WHERE INSTANCE_ID = #ProcessInstId#)
select PROCESS_INST_ID from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE where ZC_MAKE_CODE = #value#

select ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.*,'' pro_name from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE ZC_P_PRO_MAKE where 1=1
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.CO_CODE=#coCodeFilter:VARCHAR#
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS=#billStatus:VARCHAR#
ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE=#zcText0:VARCHAR#

select p.* ,m.co_name as CO_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE p ,ma_company m where p.CO_CODE=m.co_code
p.ND =#nd# and m.nd=#nd#
p.ZC_MAKE_STATUS=#zcText0:VARCHAR#
p.CO_CODE=#coCode:VARCHAR#
p.ZC_MAKE_STATUS=#status:VARCHAR#
p.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE=#zcText2:VARCHAR#
order by p.ZC_INPUT_DATE desc

select ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.CO_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ND, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_TEL, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_PRO_REMARK, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MONEY_ZC_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_APPR_SNO, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_APPR, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_APPR_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_REMARK, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_FROM, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.AGENCY, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IS_AGENCY, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IS_TO_CGZX, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_FLAG, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ORG_CODE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_PITEM_OPIWAY, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_PIFU_CGFS, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_PITEM_MODE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_CD_AWDAREA, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ORG_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MONEY_KY_BGS, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MONEY_BG_ZXS, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.AGENCY_NAME, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MONEY_HT_YBA, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_WEITO_DATE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_YEP_FLAG, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_PROJ_ORIGN, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA_ZJ, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IS_NOTARY, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IS_IMP, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IS_REMARK, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_PRINT_STATUS, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_SEQUENCE, ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_IS_BUDGET,ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.pro_id,'' pro_name ,ZC_MAKE_PF_SEQUENCE,is_des_sup,is_pub,is_car from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE ZC_P_PRO_MAKE,ZC_P_PRO_MAKE_SUPPLEMENT supplement WHERE supplement.zc_make_code(+)=ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.zc_make_code AND ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_STATUS='exec'
exists (select instance_id from v_wf_current_task_gk53 where executor =#executor# and instance_id = supplement.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = supplement.process_inst_id) and supplement.SUPPLEMENT_STATUS!='cancel' and supplement.SUPPLEMENT_STATUS!='exec'
(supplement.SUPPLEMENT_STATUS ='exec')
1=1
order by ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ZC_MAKE_CODE desc

SELECT ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.*,'' pro_name FROM ZC_P_PRO_MAKE
where ND =#nd#
ORDER BY ZC_INPUT_DATE DESC
select d.ZC_BI_NO, d.ZC_BI_DO_SUM, d.FUND_CODE, d.FUND_NAME, d.ORIGIN_CODE, d.ORIGIN_NAME, d.PAYTYPE_CODE, d.PAYTYPE_NAME, d.SENDDOC_CODE, d.SENDDOC_NAME from ZC_V_BI_DETAIL d;

select h.description, (select u.user_name from as_user u where u.user_id = h.executor) || '' || (select p.posi_name from as_position p where p.posi_code in (select ep.posi_code from as_emp_position ep where ep.emp_code = h.executor)) as executor from wf_action_history h where h.instance_id in (select m.process_inst_id from zc_p_pro_make m where m.process_inst_id=#id:LONG# )

select make.*,'' pro_name from Zc_p_Pro_Make make, ( select distinct zt.zc_make_code from Zc_Eb_Entrust zt , Zc_Eb_Pack zp where zt.sn = zp.entrust_code and zp.proj_code = #projCode# ) aa where make.zc_make_code = aa.zc_make_code

select ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_TEMP_MAKE_CODE, ZC_MAKE_NAME, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_MAKE_LINKMAN, ZC_MAKE_TEL, ZC_MAKE_STATUS, ZC_INPUT_CODE, ZC_INPUT_DATE, ZC_PRO_REMARK, ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_MONEY_ZC_SUM, ZC_MAKE_APPR_SNO, ZC_MAKE_APPR, ZC_MAKE_APPR_BLOBID, ZC_REMARK, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_MAKE_FROM, AGENCY, ZC_IS_AGENCY, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHAOGG_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGBIAO_BLOBID, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG, ZC_MAKE_ZHONGGG_BLOBID, ZC_IS_TO_CGZX, ZC_MAKE_FLAG, ORG_CODE, ZC_PITEM_OPIWAY, ZC_PIFU_CGFS, ZC_PITEM_MODE, ZC_CD_AWDAREA, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ORG_NAME, ZC_MONEY_BI_YZX, ZC_MONEY_KY_BGS, ZC_MONEY_BG_ZXS, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ_BLOBID, ZC_FGKZBFS_SMWJ, AGENCY_NAME, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_MONEY_HT_YBA, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_WEITO_DATE, ZC_YEP_FLAG, ZC_YEP_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_PROJ_ORIGN, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA_ZJ, ZC_IS_NOTARY, ZC_IS_IMP, ZC_IS_REMARK, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, ZC_PRINT_STATUS, ZC_MAKE_SEQUENCE, ZC_IS_BUDGET, ZC_XIEYI_END_DATE, ZC_NO_SHIP_REASON, ZC_ATTR1, ZC_ATTR2, ZC_ATTR3, ZC_ATTR4, ZC_ATTR5, nvl((select m.zc_item_sum from zc_p_pro_mitem m where m.zc_make_code = ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.zc_make_code and m.zc_is_cheng_jiao = '2'), 0) zc_item_sum,pro_id,'' pro_name,ZC_MAKE_PF_SEQUENCE ,is_des_sup,is_pub,is_car from zc_p_pro_make where ZC_MAKE_STATUS ='exec' zc_p_pro_make.co_code = #coCode:VARCHAR# zc_fukuan_type = #zcText0:VARCHAR# and not exists (select b.zc_bal_id from zc_p_pro_bal b where b.zc_make_code=zc_p_pro_make.zc_make_code and b.is_last_pay='Y' b.zc_make_code != #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR# ) AND exists (select h.zc_make_code from ZC_XMCG_HT h where h.nd = #nd:VARCHAR# and h.zc_ht_status = 'exec' and h.zc_make_code=ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.zc_make_code h.co_code = #coCode:VARCHAR# )

select make.*, '' pro_name from Zc_p_Pro_Make make where make.zc_input_code = #zcText0:VARCHAR# and nd = #nd:VARCHAR# and not exists (select * from zc_xmcg_ht ht where ht.zc_make_code = make.zc_make_code)
select * from v_zc_Special_Brand
select count(zc_p_pro_make.zc_make_code) from v_zc_p_pro_make_xy_hongqi zc_p_pro_make where zc_p_pro_make.zc_make_code=#zcMakeCode#
SELECT sum(T.XY_SUM) FROM v_zc_p_xy_sum T WHERE T.CO_CODE=#coCode# AND T.ND=#nd# T.ZC_MAKE_CODE! =#zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#
SELECT t.*, '' as pro_name FROM Zc_p_Pro_Make T WHERE T.PROCESS_INST_ID=#value#
SELECT t.*, '' as pro_name FROM Zc_p_Pro_Make T t.ZC_MAKE_CODE in #pmAdjustCodeList[]#
